argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rexlimd.1 | |- F/ x ph |
| 2 |  | rexlimd.2 | |- F/ x ch |
| 3 |  | rexlimd.3 | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A -> ( ps -> ch ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_ralrimi | |- ( ph -> A. x e. A ( ps -> ch ) ) |
| 5 | 2 | #P_r19.23 | |- ( A. x e. A ( ps -> ch ) <-> ( E. x e. A ps -> ch ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> ( E. x e. A ps -> ch ) ) |
\
 Obsolete proof of ~ rexlimd as of 14-Jan-2020.  (Contributed by NM, 27-May-1998.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 30-May-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
